title: From Code to Delivery
sub_title: Throughout my career, I have participated in the creation of projects that positively impacted people and businesses. Here you can browse through sites I have developed that are used by thousands of people every day. Most of the projects listed are still active; some have been discontinued, and others are not included due to contractual reasons.

projects.title: Personal portfolio built with Next.js, Tailwind, and TypeScript
projects.description: An interactive showcase of my skills, projects, and experiments with new technologies — all designed with a focus on usability and constant evolution.
longDescription: Welcome to my portfolio. This project was designed as a showcase of my skills, experiences, and work throughout my career. Here you will find a collection of my projects, highlighting my capabilities and the dedication I bring to each one.

The design is inspired by usability and mobile-first principles, ensuring navigation is as intuitive as possible so each section is easy to explore and visitors get a complete view of my work and who I am.

This project also serves as my testing lab, where I implement new libraries and technologies before using them in real-world applications. It helps me stay up-to-date with the latest market trends and maintain the quality and efficiency of my work.
features: Modern frontend with Next.js and TypeScript
challenges: Language selected dynamically based on user location

projects.title: DOVE Research Centre
projects.description: Clearly presenting research lines, providing access to publications, team profiles, and registration forms — all in a responsive and well-organized structure.
longDescription: The website of the DOVE Research Centre (Center for Research on Human Development and Violence) at the Federal University of Pelotas was developed as a bilingual institutional platform, offering content in both English and Portuguese. With a clear and modern layout, the site showcases the center's work in a highly accessible and well-structured way.
features: Admin panel for full site control
challenges: SEO for academic and technical content

projects.title: JA Índio Jiu Jitsu
projects.description: A website developed to attract and engage potential students at any stage of their journey, from white belt to black belt. Featuring a responsive, appealing, and modern design.
longDescription: The JA Índio Jiu Jitsu project, in Pelotas, RS, was designed as a responsive, organized site offering free class scheduling, class times, program descriptions (by level and audience), testimonials, contact information, and the academy's philosophy — with the goal of showcasing the academy's work, inspiring new students, and strengthening the connection with the audience.
features: Call to action with online registration

projects.title: EducaCross
projects.description: A hybrid, gamified educational platform with over 2,000 games aligned with the BNCC and adapted to each student's needs. It offers dashboards for teachers, pedagogical support, and multiplatform usage.
longDescription: While at nav9.tech, I had the opportunity to act as a tech partner to several companies; among them, I worked on several fronts of the EducaCross platform version 2.0.

It is a robust and modern EdTech platform focused on teaching Math, Portuguese, Logic, and literacy, especially for Early Childhood and Elementary Education. With over 2,000 digital games aligned with the BNCC (Brazilian National Common Core), it combines adaptive gamification, hybrid learning, and real-time reporting to engage children aged 3 to 12.

Educators and school managers have access to advanced dashboards that allow the creation of personalized learning paths, student progress monitoring, and data aligned with the BNCC. There is also pedagogical support and ongoing training for teachers, effectively connecting technology with educational practice.

The platform is compatible with classroom, lab, mobile, and offline environments, promoting digital inclusion in schools. Its hybrid architecture prioritizes security (LGPD), accessibility, and scalability, currently used in over 1,700 schools with thousands of active users.
features: Full management of learning paths via backoffice
Analytical reports for teachers and managers
Extra content such as videos and EdTech forum
challenges: Exclusive layout based on access type (school profile)

projects.title: Shoppings Iguatemi
projects.description: The Iguatemi Portal is a secure B2B platform allowing store owners to access contract info, submit documents, and engage in marketing opportunities within the Iguatemi network, all in compliance with LGPD.
longDescription: While at nav9.tech, I had the opportunity to collaborate for over 3 years on the development of Iguatemi's products, with a focus on the Store Owner Portal.

The portal is an exclusive area for store owners and their teams, focused on corporate communication, sales info, contract management, tax audits, invoice handling, benefits, news, promotions, and internal processes. Users access through a secure, encrypted interface with user/password authentication, in full compliance with LGPD, ensuring access to functions according to profile and contract.
challenges: Secure handling of tenant and contract data
SEO and performance across multiple sections
achievements: Scalable platform covering 15 malls and over 2800 stores
Improved validation of store and contract information

projects.title: Currículum Online

Built with modern technologies, the site has a clean, organized structure with smooth navigation across sections.
